testcase.name: testMarkAsRead_ShouldSynchronizeBothFields
testcase.failure:
Wanted but not invoked: notificationRepository.saveAndFlush( <custom argument matcher> ); -> at com.hivclinic.service.NotificationPersistenceTest.testMarkAsRead_ShouldSynchronizeBothFields(NotificationPersistenceTest.java:78)
However, there was exactly 1 interaction with this mock: notificationRepository.findById(1); -> at com.hivclinic.service.NotificationService.markAsRead(NotificationService.java:98)
at com.hivclinic.service.NotificationPersistenceTest.testMarkAsRead_ShouldSynchronizeBothFields(NotificationPersistenceTest.java:78) at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:568) at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511) at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511)

testcase.name: testMarkAsRead_ShouldRejectUnauthorizedAccess
testcase.system-out: DEBUG: NotificationService.markAsRead called with notificationId=1, userId=1 DEBUG: Found notification with ID=1, userId=999, isRead=false, status=SENT, title=Test Notification DEBUG: User ID mismatch - notification belongs to userId=999, but request from userId=1
